examples: She gently reminded him that the baby was getting cold and should be taken indoors.

An event like this serves to remind us that we do not have control over nature.
I rang to remind him about the party.
She looked at her watch to remind him of the time.

words: keep reminding sb PHRASAL VERBS remind sb of sb/sth

examples: The building reminded me strongly of my old school.
